fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -You may choose a target to drain blood from, attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You will gain defense equal to the Attack Level of your drained target for the night. For example, if you drain a target with Unstoppable Attack, you will gain Invincible Defense.
-You may win with roles related to vampires, if any spawn.
